mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cg_order_detail( order_id, product_id, product_name, product_url, unit_price, quantity, freight_amount, sub_total_amount ) VALUES ( #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quantity, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freightAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subTotalAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cg_order_detail WHERE order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND product_id = #{productId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM cg_order_detail WHERE
(order_id = #{item.orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND product_id = #{item.productId, jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT a.order_id orderId, a.product_id productId, a.product_name productName, a.product_url productUrl, a.unit_price unitPrice, a.quantity quantity, a.freight_amount freightAmount, a.sub_total_amount subTotalAmount FROM cg_order_detail a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND a.product_id = #{productId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.order_id orderId, a.product_id productId, a.product_name productName, a.product_url productUrl, a.unit_price unitPrice, a.quantity quantity, a.freight_amount freightAmount, a.sub_total_amount subTotalAmount FROM cg_order_detail a WHERE
(a.order_id = #{item.orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND a.product_id = #{item.productId, jdbcType=BIGINT})
ORDER BY a.order_id ASC, a.product_id ASC

SELECT a.order_id orderId, a.product_id productId, a.product_name productName, a.product_url productUrl, a.unit_price unitPrice, a.quantity quantity, a.freight_amount freightAmount, a.sub_total_amount subTotalAmount FROM cg_order_detail a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.order_id ASC, a.product_id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM cg_order_detail a WHERE 1=1
